review:
Dr. Saumya Rathi is very polite and professional  doctor than others as ever seen in my life till now. She respects all patients who are suffered with any diseases. Few months ago, My mother, was suffering with respiratory infection, not able to properly eat and take breath. After medical treatment, Now She feels healthy as normal lady. All thing are better. Now treatment is being taken by my sister who had suffered with mucus cough. she is fine now but little bit issues of cough are. If Someone asked me to suggest a doctor. I always will recommend Dr. Saumya Rathi to anyone for medical treatment. 

This is my story.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Saumya Rathi is one of the most understanding doctor I have met, She diagnosed me well, she was well attentive to my issues. Took sufficient time to analyze my problem and helped me recover fast with not so expensive medicines. 
Also, Usually The doctors i have visited write me prescription for cough & cold worth 1500-2000 for 5 days, which makes me hesitant to go to a doctor next time and do home remedies first. 
But Dr. Rathi gave me , very good and reasonable prescription. Thankyou so much, my trust in you has increased.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Rathi due to fever fearing that I would be suffering from Covid. However after considering my symptoms she told me she suspected typhoid.  I got tested at Dr . Lal Pathlab and true to her suspicion,  I had typhoid positive.  This reflects the expertise and experience of the doctor.  I  have been under her treatment for the past 2 weeks  and have recovered tremendously.  She patiently explains the problem,  the treatment, diet and medication she will prescribe along with the reasoning behind that particular course of treatment/diet/medication. No unnecessary tests or medications were prescribed,  nor did she force me to go to a particular pathology or pharmacy.
